TEXT.TITLE: ERICSSON WINS 400 MLN CROWN ALGERIAN ORDER
TEXT.BODY: L M Ericsson <ERIC ST> said it had signed a contract worth nearly 400 mln crowns with the Algerian Ministry of Telecommunications covering the supply of AXE exchanges as part of an expansion of the country's telecommunications network. REUTER
